name: aws-cms-serverless
description: This project implements a serverless backend for a simple cms management.

scripts.test: concurrently "NODE_ENV=test serverless offline start" "wait-on http://localhost:4000/dev && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all && NODE_ENV=test jest && NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all"
scripts.dev: concurrently "NODE_ENV=dev serverless offline start" "wait-on http://localhost:4000/dev && NODE_ENV=dev sequelize db:create && NODE_ENV=dev sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=dev sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=dev sequelize db:seed:all"

author: Andr√© Ciornavei <andre.ciornavei@gmail.com>
